text:
November 2, 1959
Hr* Ken Kager
Operations Manager
KUOW
The University of Washington
Seattle 5, Washington
Dear Ken:
Your paper arrived all right Wednesday evening.
It timed long and so I took the liberty of
cutting it down a bit. Sorry that you were
not able to attend. Believe that we had a
good session and the papers were received
quite well, yours among them. I sincerely
appreciate your cooperation and the preparation
of a paper on such short notice.
Best,
SLB:ks
Samuel L. Becker
Director, Division of
Television-Radio-Film
